name: Jomi
overview:
Jomi Interactive, a small Estonian startup, is a physical device which is placed either around or under a water bottle (depending on the product model) that monitors your daily water intake. Jomie reminds you whenever you are in danger of dehydration via its embedded LED lights.

Ajujaht (brain hunt) is Estonia’s largest entrepreneurial competition where 100 best business ideas from the tiny Northern Europe nation compete for a chance to win 50 000 euros. Jomi is currently among the final eight in the competition, well on its way to becoming fully developed and funded.
